title: Intern – Full-Stack Engineer
purpose: To work as part of the engineering team to develop features in Instawork's mobile app, web app, and internal tools
duties_responsibilities: Develop features in the mobile app, web app, and internal tools
Learn new skills through mentorship from senior engineers
required_qualifications: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
Completed courses in Software Engineering and CS fundamentals
Experience using Python, Ruby, or JS and SQL for backend, HTML/CSS/JS for frontend
preferred_qualifications: Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
